desc.p: A token helper for C style octal integers.
This token helper applies if the first char is zero.
desc.pre: Grammar. The number part must be preceded by "0" for octal, meaning the integer is in octal the number part is just Integer the number is followed by 0 or more flags (case doesnt matter) "U" for unsigned "L" for long "LL" for long long
